text: Hello band mates! What`s up? Does our rehearsal take place today? Cheers!
Hello buddy! Everything`s alright! Yeah, we`re gonna jam like crazy later on! :)
Wow, what a great band practice tonight! Our new song will certainly be a hit! ;)
Hi mates! Today is a beautiful day!
Absolutely, do you feel like going to the park and chill?
That's a great idea, Jim! Do you want me to pick you up in an hour?
Awesome, I'm going to fetch some cold drinks for us and will await you eagerly!
